name: Texas Instruments Incorporated
goal: Texas Instruments provides innovative semiconductor technologies to help our customers create the worlds most advanced electronics. Our analog and embedded processing technologies permeate daily life in many ways, from digital communications and entertainment to medical services, automotive systems, as well as to applications for smart manufacturing and wide ranging applications in-between.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Ecodesign, Horizon2020, REACH, RoHS, Digital Single Market, Energy Union, GDPR, TTIP, Digitizing European Industry, Gear2030, Cybersecurity
